Summary: Fairly large round, amber light at a pretty high altitude.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Council Bluffs
There were no other sightings in Council Bluffs on or around August 22nd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at an outdoor even at the Stir Concert Cove at Harrah's Casino. Looking to the north at about a 60 degree angle was a large round amber light in the clear sky. It was much, much larger than a star. It did not appear to move. It was at a pretty high altitude and look fairly far away. I was altered to the light from others in the audience who where pointing at it as well. There is an airport in the area, but it was certainly not a plain. The amber light in the sky was much bigger than standard aircraft lights or landing lights. I didn't see the object fly away. I remember looking at it twice about 15 seconds apart. Then a third look a few minutes later and it was gone. Not sure if it was in Nebraska or Iowa. Really right along the Missouri River.
